pages.privacy-policy: GoldenDunes - Privacy Policy GoldenDunes HOME About Us Casino Contact Us Privacy Policy Welcome to GoldenDunes's Privacy Policy. Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website. Information We Collect We may collect personal information that you provide to us voluntarily when you interact with our website, such as when you make a reservation, subscribe to our newsletter, or contact us for support. Use of Information We use the information we collect to provide and improve our services, personalize your experience, communicate with you, process transactions, and comply with legal obligations. Information Security We implement security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. Third-Party Disclosure We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as required by law or to provide services you have requested. Changes to This Policy We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices and services. We encourage you to review this policy regularly for any updates. The GoldenDunes website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline.
